name: In re ESTATE OF Lynn D. DEBONE. Appeal of Christina Debone

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER and BALDWIN, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE OF Lynn D. DEBONE. Appeal of Christina Debone.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of November, 2006, the Order of the Superior Court dismissing the above-captioned appeal as premature is REVERSED. The matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court for disposition on the merits. Estate of Georgiana, 312 Pa.Super. 339, 458 A.2d 989 (1983) affirmed 504 Pa. 510, 475 A.2d 744 (1984); Pa.R.A.P. 342 Note; as amended June 29, 2005.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David Albert Colecchia, Esq., Law Care, Greensburg, for Christina Debone.
Francis Robert Murrman, Esq., Greensburg, for Melissa Debone.
casebody.head_matter:
909 A.2d 798
In re ESTATE OF Lynn D. DEBONE. Appeal of Christina Debone.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted June 29, 2006.
Decided Nov. 21, 2006.
David Albert Colecchia, Esq., Law Care, Greensburg, for Christina Debone.
Francis Robert Murrman, Esq., Greensburg, for Melissa Debone.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER and BALDWIN, JJ.
